sentences.english: Smokers needed a higher dose than non-smokers to derive any benefit from Viagra.
sentences.chinese: 菸民比非吸菸人士要服用較多偉哥纔有反應。

sentences.english: But he can't say how much citrulline is needed to have Viagra-like effects.
sentences.chinese: 但他很難說需要多少瓜氨酸可以產生偉哥樣作用。

sentences.english: Viagra, also known as sildenafil, is manufactured by Pfizer Inc.
sentences.chinese: 偉哥，又名西地那非，由輝瑞公司生產。

sentences.english: But this herbal Viagra isn't for those of nervous disposition.
sentences.chinese: 但是這種草本偉哥不適用於神經質人羣。

sentences.english: When Viagra was launched in 1998 it was the only drug of its kind.
sentences.chinese: 1998年偉哥投放市場的時候，同類藥物僅此一家。

sentences.english: It's an endless cycle and if you think Viagra will help, you're wrong.
sentences.chinese: 這是個死循環，而且偉哥都幫不了你。

sentences.english: Some urologists had acquired stamps to apply their signature on Viagra prescriptions. Dr.
sentences.chinese: 一些泌尿科醫生已經使用蓋章來替代偉哥處方的簽名。

sentences.english: Pfizer has been criticised for overstating the benefits of Viagra.
sentences.chinese: 輝瑞一直受到批評，認爲它誇大了偉哥的好處。

sentences.english: Ginger increases blood circulation to act as a natural Viagra for him.
sentences.chinese: 姜可以促進血液循環，對你的他來說一種天然的偉哥。

sentences.english: Pfizer's blockbuster Viagra will face competition from generics starting next year.
sentences.chinese: 輝瑞的拳頭產品偉哥在下一年會面臨非專利藥的競爭。

sentences.english: As many as half of the Viagra anti-impotence pills sold on the Internet could be fake.
sentences.chinese: 網上賣的偉哥有一半都是假的。

sentences.english: Following Viagra After that, it is a case of escape from the pre-set target of new products.
sentences.chinese: 以下偉哥，它是由前案件逃生集新產品的目標。

sentences.english: One of the most in fashion generic drugs sold is generic Viagra.
sentences.chinese: 其中最流行的學名藥賣是普通的偉哥。

sentences.english: It's 10 years since the arrival of sildenafil citrate – or Viagra, as it is more commonly known.
sentences.chinese: 偉哥，即枸櫞酸西地那非，出現已經有10年的歷史。

definition: Descendants of the Dragon (i.e. Han Chinese)
to catch the wind/to go for a spin in the fresh air
to not go home until drunk (idiom)/let's make a night of it!
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
Brothers!/brethren/dude (colloquial)/brother (diminutive form of address between males)
photogenic/to appear on film or in the media
to chat and laugh/to crack jokes/to banter
dog food/(Internet slang) public display of affection (term used by singles 單身狗|单身狗[dan1 shen1 gou3] forced to "eat" it)
